扐字的基本解释

扐
lè
古代数蓍草占卜，将零数夹在手指中间称“扐”。
手指之间：“归奇于扐以像闰。”
余数。

扐
lì
捆绑。
中国西汉地名，故址在今山东省商河县。

扐
cái
古同“材”。

扐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lè］
［《廣韻》盧則切，入德，來。］
(1)古代筮法，数蓍草卜吉凶，称每次将数剩零余的蓍草夹在手指间为扐。亦用以指手指之间。
(2)指零数。
(3)西汉县名。
(4)通“勒”。
(5)通“捋”。

扐字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　扐； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页417第09
【唐韻】盧則切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】歷德切，?音勒。筮者著蓍指閒也。【易·繫辭】歸奇于扐以象閏，五歲再閏，故再扐而後掛。【揚子·太?經】作艻。【註】猶成也。又【集韻】六直切，音力。縛也。關中語。　又縣名。【前漢·高五王傳】濟南王辟光，以扐侯立。【註】扐音勒。平原縣也。【史記·索隱】音力。○按《說文》作朸。別見木部。

扐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
扐字的起名意思

暂无。

divination by straw
Basic explanation of words
divination by straw
lè
In ancient times, the number of yarrow was used for divination, and the zero number was sandwiched between the fingers and called "Fa".
Between the fingers: "Return to Qi Yu to draw a rune."
remainder.
divination by straw
lì
Tied up.
The name of the place in the Western Han Dynasty in China, the former address is in Shanghe County, Shandong Province.
divination by straw
cái
The ancient same "material".
divination by straw
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lè］
["Guangyun" Lu Zeqi, enter Germany, come. ]
(1) The ancient yarrow method used to count the yarrow to divide good and bad luck. It is said that every time the remaining yarrow is sandwiched between the fingers. Also used to refer to between fingers.
(2) Refers to the zero number.
(3) The name of the county in the Western Han Dynasty.
(4) Through "Le".
(5) Through "stroke".
divination by straw
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　扐; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 417 09
[Tang Yun] Lu Zeqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Li Deqie,? Yinle. The scorpion refers to leisurely. 【Yi·Cici】Return to Qi Yu to call the elephant to leap, and to leap again at the age of five, so call and hang again. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】made as 艻. [Note] It's still a success. Also 【Jiyun】Six straight cuts, sound force. Binding also. Guanzhong.　Also the county name. [Previous Han · High Five Kings Biography] King Piguang of Jinan, standing in the name of Fuhou. [Note] Shu Yinle. Pingyuan County also. 【Historical Records·Suoyin】Sound power. ○ Press "Shuowen" as a guide. Don't see Kibe.
